summary: This document is a chain of emails from June 2019 among FBI personnel and a forensic interviewer coordinating a conference call to discuss victim interviews in the Jeffrey Epstein case. It shows internal FBI planning for case coordination.

persons.name: FBI Child/Adolescent Forensic Interviewer CAFI Supervisor
persons.context: Coordinates availability for a conference call about Epstein victim interviews and provides call-in details.

events.title: Scheduled conference call on Epstein victim interviews
events.description: A conference call was scheduled for 2:00 PM Eastern Time to discuss victim interviews in the Epstein case among FBI personnel and forensic interviewers.
personsInvolved: FBI Child/Adolescent Forensic Interviewer CAFI Supervisor

events.title: ADIC requested case brief
events.description: The Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) requested a case briefing on Monday, July 1, 2019, at 3:30 PM, requiring a hard stop for the victim interview call at 3:20 PM.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively coordinating victim interviews in the Epstein case as of June 2019.
A conference call involving FBI personnel and forensic interviewers was scheduled for June 28, 2019, to discuss the interviews.
The Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) requested a case briefing on July 1, 2019, indicating high-level oversight of the investigation.
The email chain shows internal FBI communication and planning efforts related to the Epstein victim investigation.
